Colour Tracker
ISTD_Calculation_Checker
Description

Function that controls what happens when certain cells in the ISTD_Annot sheet is changed.

Here is the list of expected behaviours

When users first fill in the column Transition_Name_ISTD, The correspnding rows in the ISTD_Conc_[nM] and Custom Unit column will turn red

Columns and rows will turn green when the button "Convert to nM and Verify" is pressed when either both ISTD_Conc_[nM] and ISTD_[MW] is entered or the ISTD_Conc_[nM] is entered. Custom units will be automatically calculated. Do note that this colouring of cells is done by the function ISTD_Annot.Get_ISTD_Conc_nM_Array and not this function.

From there if any entries is modified but the row has an Transition_Name_ISTD entry, both ISTD_Conc_[nM] and ISTD_[MW] cells will turn white but ISTD_Conc_[nM] and Custom Unit will turn red.

If the Transition_Name_ISTD entry is removed, all the columns will turn white

Transition_Name_Annot_Checker
Description

Function that controls what happens when certain cells in the Transition_Name_Annot sheet is changed.

Here is the list of expected behaviours

When a cell in Transition_Name_ISTD has been modified, the cell will turn white.

When a cell in Transition_Name has been modified, the cell will turn white. All cells in the Transition_Name_ISTD column will also turn white
